LanguageData.VEE_ShipChunkHuman.label: ship chunk
LanguageData.VEE_ShipChunkHuman.description: A chunk of a spacecraft. Can be deconstructed to yield useful resources.
LanguageData.VEE_Shuttle.label: shuttle chunk
LanguageData.VEE_Shuttle.description: A chunk of a shuttle. Can be deconstructed to yield useful resources.
LanguageData.ShuttleChunkIncoming.label: shuttle chunk (incoming)
LanguageData.SlagIncoming.label: slag (incoming)
LanguageData.VEE_Plant_Bluebell.label: bluebell
LanguageData.VEE_Plant_Bluebell.description: A garden flower with a violetâ€“blue teint, with strongly recurved petals. Bluebells are very beautiful, and last long.
LanguageData.VEE_Plant_Gardenia.label: gardenia
LanguageData.VEE_Plant_Gardenia.description: A flower with large petals. Gardenias are very beautiful.
LanguageData.VEE_Plant_Gentian.label: gentian
LanguageData.VEE_Plant_Gentian.description: A large cultivated flower with inimitable blue petals. Gentians are very beautiful.
LanguageData.VEE_Plant_Petunia.label: petunia
LanguageData.VEE_Plant_Petunia.description: A long lasting flower with purple petals. Petunias are very beautiful.
